title: Overlord: Ple Ple Pleiades - Clementine Toubou-hen
original_name: ぷれぷれぷれあです ～クレマンティーヌ逃亡編～
sinopse: Clementine escapes from almighty Ainz's gaze, and Albedo with the help of Aura, Mare, and a gratuitously large army of poorly-animated CG goblins must track her down, and eliminate anything that stands in her way, Guardian.
